biblStruct.note: This article discusses a short note written on the flyleaf of the manuscript SMMJ 116 by the hand of its scribe ‘Abdīshō‘ of Gāzartā (d. 1570), the famous poet and second patriarch of the Chaldean Church. This short text contains a list of books owned by this literary figure. The list gives us a rough idea of the books circulating among the educated Syriac church elite in the early Ottoman period.
